answers.answer: Sounds like it could be reflux (GERD).  Have you ever seen a GI specialist?Mark

Go to the store and buy some liquid Maalox, then take it right before you go to bed.  Also, you could buy some over the counter Omeprozole, also known as Prilosec OTC and take it before bed as well.  Do that for a week or two and see if the problem goes away.  If not, no harm should occur from trying.This is just my opinion, as I am not a doctor.
